articles.description: Listen to BBC Radio 5 Live commentary and follow live text coverage as West Ham face Liverpool plus six more games in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League: Build-up as West Ham host Liverpool & six more games

articles.description: Liverpool agree a compensation deal with Feyenoord to allow Arne Slot to become their new manager, succeeding Jurgen Klopp.
articles.title: Arne Slot: Liverpool agree compensation deal for Feyenoord boss

articles.description: Arda Guler scores on his first La Liga start as Real Madrid close in on the title with victory at Real Sociedad.
articles.title: Teenager Guler scores as Real Madrid close on title

articles.description: Tyrese Haliburton converts a three-point play with 1.6 seconds left in overtime to give the Indiana Pacers a 2-1 lead over the Milwaukee Bucks in their Eastern Conference first-round play-off series.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Tyrese Haliburton leads Indiana Pacers to win over Milwaukee Bucks

articles.description: The Tennessee Titans choose defensive tackle T'Vondre Sweat in the pick of the selections on day two of the NFL Draft.
articles.title: NFL Draft day two: T'Vondre Sweat selected by Tennessee Titans

articles.description: Watch live BBC coverage of the World Snooker Championship 2024 at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship 2024 LIVE: Judd Trump vs Tom Ford & Shaun Murphy vs Stephen Maguire

articles.description: World number one Iga Swiatek beats Sorana Cirstea in straight sets to set up a meeting with Victoria Azarenka or Sara Sorribes Tormo.
articles.title: Madrid Open: Iga Swiatek beats Sorana Cirstea to reach last 16

articles.description: Leicester City are promoted back to the Premier League after Leeds United are beaten at QPR.
articles.title: Leicester City promoted to Premier League after Leeds lose at QPR

articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC radio commentary from the second day of week four of the 2024 County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship LIVE: Score, commentary & updates from day two of week four

articles.description: Watch and follow live updates as Wales host Italy in their final 2024 Women's Six Nations encounter.
articles.title: Women's Six Nations: Wales v Italy - watch, listen and live updates
